languages.text: "Костяк его составляли пленные из разных полков Гвардии и стражники. Они стали основой штурмовой группы, которую повел на особое задание сержант Вигастис. Остальные же — обычные люди, которым не посчастливилось угодить в плен {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Серфы и нобилитет, клерки Администратума, техноматы, пустотные рабочие, монахи... Все, кому хватило доблести взяться за оружие. Нет среди нас лишь еретиков, преступников и трусов".

traits.locale_text: "Костяк его составляли пленные из разных полков Гвардии и стражники. Они стали основой штурмовой группы, которую повел на особое задание сержант Вигастис. Остальные же — обычные люди, которым не посчастливилось угодить в плен {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Серфы и нобилитет, клерки Администратума, техноматы, пустотные рабочие, монахи... Все, кому хватило доблести взяться за оружие. Нет среди нас лишь еретиков, преступников и трусов".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."
languages.original_text: "Костяк его составляли пленные из разных полков Гвардии и стражники. Они стали основой штурмовой группы, которую повел на особое задание сержант Вигастис. Остальные же — обычные люди, которым не посчастливилось угодить в плен {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносов{/g}. Серфы и нобилитет, клерки Администратума, техноматы, пустотные рабочие, монахи... traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “我的部队的核心成员，是来自许多星界军军团的囚犯，以及一部分行星守卫。他们组成了突击队，在维加斯特军士的指挥下进行了特别行动。剩下的人，则是不幸被{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}俘虏的普通人，包括农奴、贵族、内政部文员、技工、船工、僧侣等等……所有仍有勇气举起武器的人，都在我的部队之中。至于异端分子、违法分子与懦夫，你在这里是绝对找不到的。”
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: “我的部队的核心成员，是来自许多星界军军团的囚犯，以及一部分行星守卫。他们组成了突击队，在维加斯特军士的指挥下进行了特别行动。剩下的人，则是不幸被{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}俘虏的普通人，包括农奴、贵族、内政部文员、机械殉道者、船工、僧侣等等……所有仍有勇气举起武器的人，都在我的部队之中。至于异端分子、违法分子与懦夫，你在这里是绝对找不到的。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「我が部隊の中核はさまざまな帝国防衛軍連隊の捕虜と、多くの惑星衛兵で構成されています。 彼らはヴィガステス軍曹の指揮のもと、特別作戦に出動するアサルト・スカッドを編成しました。残りは不運にも{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}に捕らえられてしまった一般人です。農奴、貴族、帝国の職員、テクノマット、ヴォイドの労働者、修道士など…職業を問わず、武装する勇気を持った人々です。ここにいないのは異端者、法を犯すもの、そして小心者くらいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: 「我が部隊の中核はさまざまな帝国防衛軍連隊の捕虜と、多くの惑星衛兵で構成されています。 彼らはヴィガステス軍曹の指揮のもと、特別作戦に出動するアサルト・スカッドを編成しました。残りは不運にも{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}に捕らえられてしまった一般人です。農奴、貴族、帝国の職員、テクノマット、ヴォイドの労働者、修道士など…職業を問わず、武装する勇気を持った人々です。ここにいないのは異端者、法を犯すもの、そして小心者くらいでしょう」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «El corazón de mi unidad está compuesto de prisioneros de distintos regimientos del Astra Militarum y varios guardias planetarios. Formaron el escuadrón de asalto que participó en la operación especial bajo el mando del sargento Vigastes. Los demás son gente corriente con la mala suerte de haber sido capturada por los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Pastores, nobles, empleados del Administratum, tecnómatas, trabajadores del vacío, monjes... Todo el que tuviera el valor para empuñar las armas. Lo único que no encontrará aquí son herejes, criminales y cobardes».
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: «El corazón de mi unidad está compuesto de prisioneros de distintos regimientos del Astra Militarum y varios guardias planetarios. Formaron el escuadrón de asalto que participó en la operación especial bajo el mando del sargento Vigastes. Los demás son gente corriente con la mala suerte de haber sido capturada por los {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Pastores, nobles, empleados del Administratum, tecnómatas, trabajadores del vacío, monjes... Todo el que tuviera el valor para empuñar las armas. Lo único que no encontrará aquí son herejes, criminales y cobardes».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by xenos. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

languages.text: « La majeure partie de mon unité est composée de prisonniers de divers régiments de l'Astra Militarum et d'un certain nombre de gardes planétaires. Ils ont d'ailleurs formé l'escouade d'assaut pour l'opération spéciale dirigée par le sergent Vigastes. Les autres ne sont que des gens ordinaires qui ont eu le malheur d'être capturés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Des serfs, des nobles, des employés de l'Administratum, des technomates, des ouvriers du vide, des moines... Tous ceux qui ont eu le courage de prendre les armes. En revanche, je peux vous promettre que vous ne trouverez ni hérétiques, ni hors-la-loi, ni lâches dans nos rangs. »
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: « La majeure partie de mon unité est composée de prisonniers de divers régiments de l'Astra Militarum et d'un certain nombre de gardes planétaires. Ils ont d'ailleurs formé l'escouade d'assaut pour l'opération spéciale dirigée par le sergent Vigastes. Les autres ne sont que des gens ordinaires qui ont eu le malheur d'être capturés par les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Des serfs, des nobles, des employés de l'Administratum, des technomates, des ouvriers du vide, des moines... Tous ceux qui ont eu le courage de prendre les armes. En revanche, je peux vous promettre que vous ne trouverez ni hérétiques, ni hors-la-loi, ni lâches dans nos rangs. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Der Kern meiner Einheit besteht aus Gefangenen aus verschiedenen Regimentern des Astra Militarum und einigen Planetenwachen. Sie bildeten den Sturmtrupp, der unter Sergeant Vigastes Kommando die Spezialoperation durchgeführt hat. Der Rest sind gewöhnliche Menschen, die das Pech hatten, in die Gefangenschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} zu geraten. Sklaven, Adlige, Administratum-Beamte, Technomaten, Leerenarbeiter, Mönche ... jeder, der den Mut gefunden hat, zur Waffe zu greifen. Das Einzige, was Ihr hier nicht finden werdet, sind Ketzer, Gesetzesbrecher und Feiglinge."
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kern meiner Einheit besteht aus Gefangenen aus verschiedenen Regimentern des Astra Militarum und einigen Planetenwachen. Sie bildeten den Sturmtrupp, der unter Sergeant Vigastes Kommando die Spezialoperation durchgeführt hat. Der Rest sind gewöhnliche Menschen, die das Pech hatten, in die Gefangenschaft der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} zu geraten. Sklaven, Adlige, Administratum-Beamte, Technomaten, Leerenarbeiter, Mönche ... jeder, der den Mut gefunden hat, zur Waffe zu greifen. Das Einzige, was Ihr hier nicht finden werdet, sind Ketzer, Gesetzesbrecher und Feiglinge."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Birimimin ana kuvveti, çeşitli Astra Militarum alaylarından alınan esirlerden ve bir dizi gezegen muhafızından oluşuyor. Bu saydıklarımdan bir taarruz mangası kurup Çavuş Vigastes'in komutasına verdim, birlikte özel bir operasyona çıktılar. Kalanlarsa {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenoların{/g} kaçırdığı, kadersiz, sıradan insanlar. Köleler, soylular, Administratum kâtipleri, teknomatlar, uçsuz işçileri, keşişler... Eli silah tutacak kadar cesareti olan herkes yani. Burada sadece kâfirlere, suçlulara ve korkaklara yer yoktur."
languages.original_text: "The core of my unit is composed of prisoners from various Astra Militarum regiments and a number of planetary guards. They formed the assault squad that went on the special operation under Sergeant Vigastes's command. The rest are common people who had the misfortune of being captured by {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Serfs, nobility, Administratum clerks, technomats, void workers, monks... Anyone who found the courage to take up arms. The only kinds you won't find here are heretics, lawbreakers, and cowards."

traits.locale_text: "Birimimin özü, çeşitli Astra Militarum alayları ve bir dizi gezegen muhafızından oluşuyor. Çavuş Vigastes'in komutası altında bir özel operasyona katılan bir saldırı mangası oluşturdular. Geri kalanlarsa {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolar{/g} tarafından kaçırılan kadersiz sıradan insanlar. Köleler, soylular, Administratum kâtipleri, teknomatonlar, uçsuz işçileri, keşişler... Eli silah tutacak kadar cesareti olan herkes yani. Burada sadece kâfirler, suçlular ve korkaklardan eser yoktur."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
